GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.24 to before v5.15.82
GSD.description:
hwmon: (ibmpex) Fix possible UAF when ibmpex_register_bmc() fails

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.82 by commit 45f6e81863747c0d7bc6a95ec51129900e71467a, it was introduced in version v2.6.24 by commit 57c7c3a0fdea95eddcaeba31e7ca7dfc917682ab. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: hwmon: (ibmpex) Fix possible UAF when ibmpex_register_bmc() fails
OSV.details:
